video.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Bridezillas
video.synopsis: This "Bridezillas" spin-off follows five of that show's couples as they try to save their crumbling marriages while living under the same roof.

episodes.synopsis: Five outrageous Bridezillas and their husbands attend Marriage Boot Camp in a last-ditch effort to save their failing marriages.
episodes.title: Who Needs Therapy

episodes.synopsis: The couples take a trip to Splitsville, facing off with divorce attorneys. Then, they're forced to attend a lifelike funeral of their spouse.
episodes.title: Grave Loss

episodes.synopsis: Couples are brought to a firing line to test their listening skills. Paintball gets personal, and someone is shocked by a visit from their past.
episodes.title: Love and Warfare

episodes.synopsis: Bridezillas are forced to swap spouses, triggering rifts and realizations. A husband deletes secret texts from his cell phone to avoid detection.
episodes.title: Spouse Swap

episodes.synopsis: The couples learn to dance the tango, but the exercise is interrupted when a husband suddenly collapses and is taken away in an ambulance.
episodes.title: Dance with the Devil

episodes.synopsis: A husband returns from the hospital and admits he has been cheating on his wife. Later, a field trip to a sex shop proves too much for some.
episodes.title: Sex, Lies & Cellphones

episodes.synopsis: Confrontation explodes when the directors are stonewalled. Later, couples must sink or swim when they find themselves aboard a sinking ship.
episodes.title: The Plunge

episodes.synopsis: Couples must write down three questions they want their spouse to answer under a lie detector test. The truth unleashes unforeseen consequences.
episodes.title: Liars Exposed

episodes.synopsis: Couples complete boot camp and decide whether they will call it quits. An impromptu bachelor party leads one husband astray.
episodes.title: I Do or I Don't

episodes.synopsis: The Bridezilla couples hash out issues that occurred during and after Marriage Boot Camp. Porsha serves Byron divorce papers.
episodes.title: Bridezillas Reunion
